snippet: Paul Pogba, the world's most expensive player, will make his second debut for Manchester United against Southampton on Friday after being named by coach Jose Mourinho....

headline.main: World Record Buy Pogba Starts for Man Utd v Southampton
headline.print_headline: World Record Buy Pogba Starts for Man Utd v Southampton

lead_paragraph: Paul Pogba, the world's most expensive player, will make his second debut for Manchester United against Southampton on Friday after being named by coach Jose Mourinho.

snippet: Huddersfield Town have taken Australia midfielder Aaron Mooy on a season-long loan from Manchester City, the Championship (second tier) club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Midfielder Mooy Joins Huddersfield on Loan From Man City
headline.print_headline: Midfielder Mooy Joins Huddersfield on Loan From Man City

lead_paragraph: Huddersfield Town have taken Australia midfielder Aaron Mooy on a season-long loan from Manchester City, the Championship (second tier) club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Liverpool's England midfielder Jordan Henderson will be sidelined for six to eight weeks with a knee ligament injury, ruling him out for the rest of the Premier League season and possibly the Euro 2016 campaign....

headline.main: Injury Hits England Midfielder Henderson's Euro 2016 Hopes
headline.print_headline: Injury Hits England Midfielder Henderson's Euro 2016 Hopes

lead_paragraph: Liverpool's England midfielder Jordan Henderson will be sidelined for six to eight weeks with a knee ligament injury, ruling him out for the rest of the Premier League season and possibly the Euro 2016 campaign.

snippet: English Premier League champions Leicester City paid a visit to Bangkok's glittering Grand Palace on Thursday and signed a well-wishing book for the country's revered monarch King Bhumibol Adulyadej....

headline.main: English Champions Leicester Visit Thai King's Palace
headline.print_headline: English Champions Leicester Visit Thai King's Palace

lead_paragraph: English Premier League champions Leicester City paid a visit to Bangkok's glittering Grand Palace on Thursday and signed a well-wishing book for the country's revered monarch King Bhumibol Adulyadej.

snippet: Sunderland manager David Moyes has been handed a one-match touchline ban after he admitted abusing a match official, the Football Association said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Sunderland's Moyes Handed One-Game Touchline Ban
headline.print_headline: Sunderland's Moyes Handed One-Game Touchline Ban

lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager David Moyes has been handed a one-match touchline ban after he admitted abusing a match official, the Football Association said on Tuesday.

snippet: England manager Roy Hodgson has delayed naming his squad for the European Championship until Monday so that he can "better assess players' fitness" after this weekend's Premier League finale....

headline.main: England Boss Delays Naming Euro 2016 Squad Until Monday
headline.print_headline: England Boss Delays Naming Euro 2016 Squad Until Monday

lead_paragraph: England manager Roy Hodgson has delayed naming his squad for the European Championship until Monday so that he can "better assess players' fitness" after this weekend's Premier League finale.

snippet: Manchester United midfielder Bastian Schweinsteiger is unlikely to play for his club again season due to a knee injury, manager Louis van Gaal said on Friday....

headline.main: Schweinsteiger Unlikely to Play for United This Season-Van Gaal
headline.print_headline: Schweinsteiger Unlikely to Play for United This Season-Van Gaal

lead_paragraph: Manchester United midfielder Bastian Schweinsteiger is unlikely to play for his club again season due to a knee injury, manager Louis van Gaal said on Friday.

snippet: West Ham United striker Nikica Jelavic has joined Chinese second division side Beijing Renhe, the Premier League club's chairman David Gold tweeted....

headline.main: West Ham Striker Jelavic Moves to China
headline.print_headline: West Ham Striker Jelavic Moves to China

lead_paragraph: West Ham United striker Nikica Jelavic has joined Chinese second division side Beijing Renhe, the Premier League club's chairman David Gold tweeted.

snippet: Chelsea midfielder Oscar has said that he has no reason to leave the club and was keen to add to his trophy haul with the Premier League champions....

headline.main: Brazilian Midfielder Oscar Commits to Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Midfielder Oscar Commits to Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Chelsea midfielder Oscar has said that he has no reason to leave the club and was keen to add to his trophy haul with the Premier League champions.
